TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RuntimeEnvironment extends System.Object

summary.span: Proporciona una colección de métodos que devuelven información sobre el entorno de Common Language Runtime.

span.span: Provides a collection of methods that return information about the common language runtime environment.

remarks.format: ## Examples Este ejemplo muestra cómo llamar a muchos de los métodos definidos por el clase.This example shows how to call many of the methods defined by the class. summary.span: Devuelve el directorio donde está instalado Common Language Runtime.

span.span: Returns the directory where the common language runtime is installed.

span.span: A string that contains the path to the directory where the common language runtime is installed.

span.span: The identifier for the desired class.
The identifier for the desired interface.

summary.span: Devuelve la interfaz especificada en la clase indicada.

span.span: Returns the specified interface on the specified class.

returns.span: Puntero no administrado a la interfaz solicitada.

span.span: An unmanaged pointer to the requested interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este método es similar a llamar al método en la interfaz que representa este tiempo de ejecución.This method is similar to calling the method on the interface that represents this runtime. La tabla siguiente muestran las combinaciones admitidas para `clsid` y `riid`.The following table shows the supported combinations for `clsid` and `riid`. |`clsid`|`riid`| |-------------|------------| |CLSID_CorMetaDataDispenserCLSID_CorMetaDataDispenser|IID_IMetaDataDispenser, IID_IMetaDataDispenserExIID_IMetaDataDispenser, IID_IMetaDataDispenserEx| |CLSID_CorMetaDataDispenserRuntimeCLSID_CorMetaDataDispenserRuntime|IID_IMetaDataDispenser, IID_IMetaDataDispenserExIID_IMetaDataDispenser, IID_IMetaDataDispenserEx| |CLSID_CorRuntimeHostCLSID_CorRuntimeHost|IID_CorRuntimeHostIID_CorRuntimeHost| |CLSID_CLRRuntimeHostCLSID_CLRRuntimeHost|IID_CLRRuntimeHost (no es válido para el common language runtime que está proporcionando la [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]), IID_CLRRuntimeHost3IID_CLRRuntimeHost (not valid for the common language runtime that is provided by the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]), IID_CLRRuntimeHost3| |CLSID_TypeNameFactoryCLSID_TypeNameFactory|IID_TypeNameFactoryIID_TypeNameFactory| |CLSID_CLRStrongNameCLSID_CLRStrongName|IID_CLRStrongNameIID_CLRStrongName| es similar a la método. is similar to the method.

span.span: [IUnknown::QueryInterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=144867) failure.

permission.span: requiere plena confianza para el llamador inmediato.

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: Este miembro no puede usarse por código de confianza parcial o transparente.

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

summary.span: Obtiene el número de versión de Common Language Runtime que está ejecutando el proceso actual.

span.span: Gets the version number of the common language runtime that is running the current process.

returns.span: Cadena que contiene el número de versión de Common Language Runtime.

span.span: A string containing the version number of the common language runtime.
